body_html:
Somewhat related question: I am curious how to effectively move data from the CPU to multiple GPU's using the Dataset API.
Do we need a dataset and iterator per GPU? Or can a single iterator provide unique data to each tower of the GPU? I have a more detailed question with an example code snippet here at stackoverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46965098/how-does-one-move-data-to-multiple-gpu-towers-using-tensorflows-dataset-api

body:
Somewhat related question: I am curious how to effectively move data from the CPU to multiple GPU's using the Dataset API.
Do we need a dataset and iterator per GPU? Or can a single iterator provide unique data to each tower of the GPU? I have a more detailed question with an example code snippet here at stackoverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46965098/how-does-one-move-data-to-multiple-gpu-towers-using-tensorflows-dataset-api
